title: Wiring Manifest Entry Schema
description: Defines the structure for an entry in the wiring_manifest.json log.

loop_id.description: The unique identifier for the loop that performed the wiring.

agent_id.description: The identifier(s) of the agent(s) primarily responsible for the wiring action.

memory_surfaces_written.description: List of memory surface file paths modified or created.

controller_invoked.description: The controller script invoked for the loop.

verification_status.description: Status of the wiring validation checks for this entry.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the wiring entry was logged.

schema_version.description: Version of the wiring_manifest.schema.json this entry conforms to.

git_commit_hash.description: The Git commit hash associated with the completion of the batch.

pr_id.description: The Pull Request ID associated with the completion of the batch.
